Entries.dating_Robin_memory_oneday: Wow, you and Mom, this is... unexpected. I always thought you and I... nevermind.#$e#You and Mom seem very happy though, so that’s all that really matters.
Entries.married_Robin: Never imagined you'd end up being my stepdad. Life's funny sometimes.^Never imagined you'd end up being my stepmom. Life's funny sometimes.

Entries.Fri: Mom and I are sharing my room.#$b#It's a little crowded but it's nice to have some girl time.
Entries.Sun: Mom is single and ready to mingle, again.#$b#She's moved into my room until she figures something out.
